content:
# Digital Video Format

> **Format = Codec + Container (Wrapper)**
> 
- Codec : Coder-decoder, algorithm used to encode the video. (Including the use of **I-frame, P-frame and B-frame**)
- Container : Wrapper that stores video stream and related content, including video stream, audio stream, subtitles and metadata.

[Explaining Digital Video: Formats, Codecs & Containers](https://youtu.be/-4NXxY4maYc)

[How to Understand Codecs](https://youtu.be/sisvOeZItb0)
